name: Ronin: Zero
description:
Ronin: Zero is my first project, uploading it to sharing websites as part of an assignment for school. 

It is a 2D platformer with cyberpunk / feudal Japanese themes. It has enemies and simple combat. There are 5 levels and it's still a WIP. 

Check it out if you want :>

The game features;

  • Pixel artwork and a parallax background
  • Platforming mechanics
  • Enemies and basic combat
  • 5 Levels

Controls:

W, A, D to move 

W, W to double jump

J to attack
